name: NSMergeConflict
desc: An encapsulation of conflicts that occur during an attempt to save changes in a managed object context.

items.name: init(source: NSManagedObject, newVersion: Int, oldVersion: Int, cachedSnapshot: [String : Any]?, persistedSnapshot: [String : Any]?)
var sourceObject: NSManagedObject
items.desc: The source object for the conflict.

items.name: var objectSnapshot: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the values of the source object.

items.name: var cachedSnapshot: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the values of the source object held in the persistent store coordinator layer.

items.name: var persistedSnapshot: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the values of the source object held in the persistent store.

items.name: var newVersionNumber: Int
items.desc: The new version number for the change.

items.name: var oldVersionNumber: Int
items.desc: The old version number for the change.
